troubleshooting.title: Keyboard Shortcuts Do Not Work At All

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: The keyboard shortcuts listed in the Menu Shortcut Keys preferences page do not work.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: Usually this happens when a special keyboard layout is set (in the operating system) that generates non-standard characters. For example, an extended Greek layout will generate special characters that are not present in the default Greek layout. This causes the Java virtual machine that runs the application to receive unexpected key codes.

steps-informal.p: Reset the keyboard layout to the standard layout for your particular language.
